
describe-vpc-attribute
**********************


DESCRIPTION
===========


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws ec2 describe-vpc-attribute
     --vpc-id <value>
     [--enable-dns-hostnames <value>]
     [--enable-dns-support <value>]


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--vpc-id"  (string)


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

"--enable-dns-hostnames"  (string)

"--enable-dns-support"  (string)
